name: Baxton_Studio_Georgios_Modern_and_Contemporary_Twin_Size_Fabric_Upholstered_Headboard_
reviews: My son picked this out for his room. We liked the style and he was in need of something more modern. I thought the price was good, and it was shipped ahead of schedule.
description:
Add a touch of romance to the look and feel of your boudoir with the Georgios Upholstered Headboard.  Featuring clean lines, subtle hues and chic, the Georgios headboard will create a handsome aesthetic in your bedroom interior.  Constructed of solid rubberwood frame and plywood, the headboard is built to last.  Soft polyester fabric in greyish-beige or dark grey tone over the foam filled headboard provides ample comfort for you to lean against.  Leg supports are invisible once set up and can be adjusted to suit the height of your ensemble for convenience.  Headboard sits between the wall and the ensemble frame, attaching not to the bed base but to the legs, for stability.  Made in Malaysia, this Twin size headboard requires assembly.

Modern and contemporary twin size upholstered headboardMaterials:  Solid rubberwood frame, plywood, foam and polyester fabricFabric color:  greyish-beige or dark greySiilver nailheads trim for a classy and glamour lookThe headboard comes with 2 pre-drilled holes (with height from ground up of 5.5 inches and 8 inches) that go with any Leggett and Platt bedframe The upper part on the back of the headboard's legs comes with 5 predrilled holes with 2.55 inches apart from one another for height adjustmentAssembly requiredMade in MalaysiaFurniture Pattern: SolidFurniture Room: BedroomProduct Features: Adjustable HeightMaterial: Rubberwood, Foam, PolyesterStyle: Contemporary, ModernAssembly: Assembly RequiredBed Style: HeadboardsExact Color: Grey, BeigeFinish: Grey Finish, Beige FinishColor: Grey, BeigeSize: TwinStyleContemporary, ModernMaterialFoam, Polyester, RubberwoodFinishBeige Finish, Grey FinishBed StyleHeadboardsAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBeige, GreyFurniture PatternSolidProduct FeaturesAdjustable Height
